DE

The Window Cleaner

1994 • 8 min • Germany

Synopsis

The shy window cleaner Anton sees waitress Sophie at work, it's love at first sight. Her jealous boss harasses his new employee. Anton sees red and gets a huge sledgehammer ...

Veit Helmer
